name: Hot Wallet
description: Hot wallet program that will sign and transfer blockchain transactions

PROJECT_ID.description: The hot wallet will be registered to sign transactions for that CoMakery's project id

PROJECT_API_KEY.description: Api key generated on CoMakery for the PROJECT_ID provided

COMAKERY_SERVER_URL.description: Api key generated on CoMakery for the PROJECT_ID provided

PURESTAKE_API.description: Api key generated on Purestake to operate with Algorand blockchain. Required to use with algorand blockchain.

EMPTY_QUEUE_DELAY.description: Timeout in second between checking for new transactions to send when previously we DO NOT have a transaction.

BETWEEN_TRANSACTION_DELAY.description: Timeout in second between checking for new transactions to send when previously we had a transaction.

BLOCKCHAIN_NETWORK.description: Which network should we use for the hot wallet: algorand, algorand_test, algorand_beta, ethereum, ethereum_ropsten, ethereum_rinkeby

MAX_AMOUNT_FOR_TRANSFER.description: Maximum amount of tokens to send in base units. Unlimited by default

INFURA_PROJECT_ID.description: Project id generated on Infura. Required to use with ethereum blockchain.

ETHEREUM_TOKEN_TYPE.description: Ethereum Token Type: erc20, erc20_batch, token_release_schedule. Required to use with ethereum blockchain.

ETHEREUM_TOKEN_SYMBOL.description: Ethereum Token symbol (CERE for example). It uses to get a balance of the token. Required to use with ethereum blockchain.

ETHEREUM_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.description: Ethereum contract address of the token. It uses to get a balance of the token. Required to use with ethereum blockchain.

ETHEREUM_APPROVAL_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.description: Ethereum contract address for sending `approve` tx. It uses to allow batch transfers or use lockup contract

OPT_IN_APP.description: Algorand app to auto opt-in. Required to use with algorand blockchain.
